description: From Middle English beseken, equivalent to be- +‎ seek. Cognate with Scots beseik (“to beseek”). More at beseech.

verbs.description: beseek (third-person singular simple present beseeks, present participle beseeking, simple past and past participle besought)

entries.meaning: (transitive, dialectal, Northern England, Scotland) To beseech; entreat.
